labels.name: story
labels.value: Courier can't login with invalid credentials

name: Request returns an error if password field is empty

description: Create a courier with valid credentials. Log in with only login field. Response should contain an error message. Postcondition: Log in with correct credentials. Get courier's ID and delete the courier.
